DOC.brief_summary: A Blind-adjudication Multi-center Phase II Randomized Clinical Trial Continuous Low-dose Intravenous Heparin Therapy Coiled Low-grade Aneurysmal Subarachnoid Hemorrhage Patients Significant Hemorrhage Burden .
DOC.brief_title: Aneurysmal Subarachnoid Hemorrhage Trial RandOmizing Heparin
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study investigate safety clinical effect continuous low-dose intravenous unfractionated heparin ( LDIVH ) infusion prevention aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage ( aSAH ) induce neurocognitive dysfunction delay neurological deficit . Additionally , increase blood CSF level certain inflammatory biomarkers ( IL-6 , hsCRP , etc ) correlate aSAH patient poor clinical outcome . Unfractionated heparin ( UFH ) know anti-inflammatory action . As result , secondary objective study evaluate whether LDIVH reduce blood CSF inflammatory biomarkers level compare control whether association inflammatory biomarker level cognitive outcomes aSAH .

Concurrent significant intracranial pathology identify prior enrollment , include limited , Moyamoya disease , high suspicion document CNS vasculitis , severe fibromuscular dysplasia , arteriovenous malformation , arteriovenous fistula , significant cervical intracranial atherosclerotic stenotic disease ( ≥70 % ) , malignant brain tumor . 18 . Immunosuppression therapy include chronic corticosteroid usage . 22 . Remote history previous rupture cerebral aneurysm . 23 . History gastrointestinal hemorrhage major systemic hemorrhage within 30 day , hemoglobin le 8 g/dL , INR ≥1.5 , severe liver impairment ( AST < ALT < AP < GGT > 2 x normal cirrhosis ) , creatinine > 2.0 mg/dL , estimate GFR < 60 ml/min . 24 . Major surgery ( include open femoral , aortic , carotid surgery ) within previous 30 day . 25 . Currently pregnant . 26 . Enrollment another research study would conflict study .
